# protVis

<!-- badges: start -->
<!-- badges: end -->

The goal of protVis is to compare protein sequences and visualize the differences at amino acid positions.

## Installation

You can install the released version of protVis from [CRAN](https://CRAN.R-project.org) with:

``` r
require("devtools")
devtools::install_github("khaledelemam/protVis", build_vignettes = TRUE)
library("protVis")
```

## Contributions

This package was developed by Khaled Elemam.
